Name: Bridge Wardens Crest
Description: Perfect Dodge increases Melee Damage by 20% for 10 seconds. Perfect Evade Flop also gains 10% Damage Reduction for the duration.
Location: When you speak to the Bridge Warden and have NOT killed any of the Fae who are fighting with the Dran, he will award you this ring and praise you for not succumbing to the blood hunger.
